 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָהַר‎</span>] **verb** ==hasten== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el,and derivatives; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be practised, skilled*** (with Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***mâru***</u></abbr>, ***send***, ***order***, ***govern***, compare II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מהר‎</span>); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***train teach***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el ***id.***; compare also Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***m¹har***</u></abbr>, ***trained warrior*** [[BDB#Bondi|Bondi]]<sup>57</sup>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְהָ֑רָה‎</span> [[Job.5.13|Job 5:13]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְהָר‎</span> [[Hab.1.6|Hab 1:6]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְהָרִים‎</span> [[Isa.32.4|Isa 32:4]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְהֲרֵי‎</span> [[Isa.35.4|Isa 35:4]] — ***be hurried*** = anxious, disturbed <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְמְהֲרֵילֵֿב‎</span> [[Isa.35.4|Isa 35:4]] ***hasty, precipitate***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵצָה‎</span> [[Job.5.13|Job 5:13]] so participle as substantive [[Isa.32.4|Isa 32:4]] ***impetuous***, of Chaldeans, [[Hab.1.6|Hab 1:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַר‎</span>). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִהַר‎</span> [[1Sam.4.14|1Sam 4:14]]; [[Isa.51.14|Isa 51:14]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִהֲרָה‎</span> [[Jer.48.16|Jer 48:16]] etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמַהֵר‎</span> [[Isa.5.19|Isa 5:19]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמַהֵר‎</span> [[Gen.18.6|Gen 18:6]] + 8 t. ([[1Sam.28.30|1Sam 28:30]] see below); 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּמַהֵרְנָה‎</span> [[Jer.9.17|Jer 9:17]] etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֵר‎</span> [[Gen.19.22|Gen 19:22]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֲרָה‎</span> [[1Sam.23.27|1Sam 23:27]]; [[1Kgs.22.9|1Kgs 22:9]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֵר‎</span> [[Prov.7.23|Prov 7:23]] +; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַהֵר‎</span> [[Gen.41.32|Gen 41:32]]; [[Mal.3.5|Mal 3:5]] (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֵר‎</span> [[Zeph.1.14|Zeph 1:14]] [[[1Sam.23.22|1Sam 23:22]]] compare [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 268</sup> [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZAW x. 1890, 176</sup> see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֵר‎</span> ), feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַהֲרוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.6.18|Prov 6:18]] — 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **l.** ***hasten, make haste***, = go or come quickly [[Gen.18.6|Gen 18:6]]; [[1Sam.9.12|1Sam 9:12]] ( but strike out [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]), [[Nah.2.6|Nah 2:6]]; [[Isa.49.17|Isa 49:17]]; [[1Chr.12.9|1Chr 12:9]] = go eagerly, (followed by Infinitive of purpose) [[Prov.1.16|Prov 1:16]]; [[Isa.59.7|Isa 59:7]] ***Participle*** = swift, prompt [[Mal.3.5|Mal 3:5]] of bird [[Prov.7.23|Prov 7:23]] figurative of calamity [[Isa.5.19|Isa 5:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּשׁ‎</span>) [[Jer.48.16|Jer 48:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֵר שָׁלָל חָשׁ בַּז‎</span> [[Isa.8.1|Isa 8:1]]; [[Isa.8.3|Isa 8:3]], below 

**2.** ***hasten*** + verb, (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> having really adverbial force): followed by Infinitive [[Gen.18.7|Gen 18:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִהַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַעֲשׂת‎</span>); compare [[Gen.27.20|Gen 27:20]]; [[Gen.41.32|Gen 41:32]] (subject God), [[Exod.2.18|Exod 2:18]]; [[Exod.10.16|Exod 10:16]]; [[Exod.12.33|Exod 12:33]]; [[2Sam.15.14|2Sam 15:14]]; [[Isa.32.4|Isa 32:4]]; [[Isa.51.14|Isa 51:14]]; [[Prov.6.18|Prov 6:18]]; [[Eccl.5.1|Eccl 5:1]] more often followed by verb with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ו‎</span> [[Gen.24.18|Gen 24:18]]; [[Gen.24.20|Gen 24:20]]; [[Gen.24.46|Gen 24:46]]; [[Gen.44.11|Gen 44:11]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.45.9|Gen 45:9]]; [[Gen.45.13|Gen 45:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), probably [[Gen.43.30|Gen 43:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), also [[Exod.34.8|Exod 34:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Josh.4.10|Josh 4:10]]; [[Josh.8.14|Josh 8:14]]; [[Josh.8.19|Josh 8:19]] (all [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.13.10|Judg 13:10]]; [[1Sam.4.14|1Sam 4:14]]; [[1Sam.17.48|1Sam 17:48]]; [[1Sam.23.27|1Sam 23:27]]; [[1Sam.25.18|1Sam 25:18]]; [[1Sam.25.23|1Sam 25:23]]; [[1Sam.25.34|1Sam 25:34]] (twice in verse); [[1Sam.28.24|1Sam 28:24]]; [[2Sam.15.14|2Sam 15:14]]; [[2Sam.19.17|2Sam 19:17]]; [[1Kgs.20.33|1Kgs 20:33]]; [[1Kgs.20.41|1Kgs 20:41]]; [[2Kgs.9.13|2Kgs 9:13]]; [[Jer.9.17|Jer 9:17]] so even when active is not wholly voluntary [[1Sam.28.20|1Sam 28:20]] (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּבָּהֵל‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); also, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ו‎</span> omitted, [[Ps.106.13|Ps 106:13]] especially with Imperative [[Gen.19.22|Gen 19:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.9.48|Judg 9:48]]; [[Esth.6.10|Esth 6:10]] so also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֵר עֲנֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.69.18|Ps 69:18]]; [[Ps.102.3|Ps 102:3]]; [[Ps.143.7|Ps 143:7]] compare [[Ps.79.8|Ps 79:8]] (see [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>***on the passage***</sup>). 

**3.** transitive ***hasten***, = prepare quickly [[Gen.18.6|Gen 18:6]] = bring quickly [[1Kgs.22.9|1Kgs 22:9]] = [[2Chr.18.8|2Chr 18:8]]; [[Esth.5.5|Esth 5:5]] = do quickly [[2Chr.24.5|2Chr 24:5]] (twice in verse). 



 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֵר‎</span> **adjective** ==hastening, speedy, swift== (strictly **Pi\`el** ***Participle*** for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַהֵר‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מהר‎</span>); — of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְאד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרוֺב וּמ‎</span> [[Zeph.1.14|Zeph 1:14]] read also feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּהֵרָה‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלוֺ‎</span>) [[1Sam.23.22|1Sam 23:22]] ***his swift foot*** (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָאָהוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span>) [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]; deeper corruption assumed by [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]. **II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהֵר‎</span> adverb quickly, speedily** (strictly **Pi\`el** ==infinitive absolute==) always immediately after verb; [[Exod.32.8|Exod 32:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.4.26|Deut 4:26]]; [[Deut.7.4|Deut 7:4]]; [[Deut.7.22|Deut 7:22]]; [[Deut.9.3|Deut 9:3]]; [[Deut.9.12|Deut 9:12]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.9.16|Deut 9:16]]; [[Deut.28.20|Deut 28:20]]; [[Josh.2.5|Josh 2:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.2.17|Judg 2:17]]; [[Judg.2.23|Judg 2:23]]; [[Prov.25.8|Prov 25:8]] (on [[Ps.69.18|Ps 69:18]]; [[Ps.79.8|Ps 79:8]]; [[Ps.102.3|Ps 102:3]]; [[Ps.143.7|Ps 143:7]], where <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> precedes, see above below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָהַר‎</span>).
